japanese:
（ああ、もう！
　せっかくフー君と２人きりだったのに！
　せっかく来たチャンスだったのに～！）
translation:
(Aahh, dang!
 Even though I was alone with Fu-kun!
 Even though I had my chance!)

japanese:
（なのに失敗しちゃった。
　どうして、いつもうまくいかないのよ……）
translation:
(Yet, I failed.
 Why does it never go my way...)

japanese: はあぁぁぁ……。
translation: *sigh*

japanese: 二乃はどうしたんですか？
translation: Nino, what's wrong?

japanese: ええっと、いつものって感じ。
translation: Um, it's the usual thing.

japanese: ……上杉君ですか。
translation: ...Uesugi-kun, huh.

japanese:
二乃、ごめんね。
泳いでたら人影が見えて、
何も考えないで近づいちゃって……。
translation:
Nino, I'm sorry.
I saw your shape when I was swimming.
and I just approached you without thinking...

japanese:
謝らなくていいわよ。
あんたに悪気はなかったって知ってるもの。
translation:
You don't need to apologize.
I know you didn't have any bad intentions.

japanese:
けど……それはそれとして
自分自身にイライラするのよ。
translation: But...I'm just frustrated with myself as well.

japanese: どうして？
translation: Why?

japanese: ……言わせる気？
translation: ...You think I'll talk?

japanese: 実は、聞かなくてもわかる。
translation: Actually, I can tell without asking.

japanese: でしょうね。
translation: Right.

japanese:
……自分が不甲斐ないわ。
どうしたら意識してくれるのかしら。
translation:
...I'm spineless.
I wonder how I can get him to notice me.

japanese:
なにしろ相手が相手です。
ここは気負わず、焦らず、冷静になるのが
一番ですよ！
translation:
In any case, he is who he is.
It's best to remain coolheaded. Don't get
worked up and try to relax!

japanese: それじゃ、永遠に今の関係から変われないわ。
translation:
At that rate,
our current relationship will never change.

japanese: ホント、相手が相手だもんねぇ。
translation: He really IS who he IS.

japanese: ですが……。
translation: But...

japanese:
はいはーい！
作戦を変えてみたらどうかな。
translation:
Okay, okaaay!
What if you change your strategy?

japanese:
作戦を変える？
たとえば、どんな？
translation:
Change my strategy?
Like how?

japanese: ええっと……ぐぬぬぬ……。
translation: Umm... Hrrrmmmm...

japanese: ……四葉に聞いたのが間違いだったわ。
translation: ...It was a mistake to ask you, Yotsuba.

japanese: ごめーん、こういうのは苦手で……。
translation: Sorry, I'm not good at this...

japanese:
フータロー君、前に言ってたもんね。
恋なんて学業からもっともかけ離れた
愚かな行為、だっけ。
translation:
Futaro-kun mentioned it himself, didn't he?
Love is the stupidest act, and has nothing to do with
schoolwork.

japanese: で、でも、今は変わったと思うよ？
translation: B-but, I think he's changed since then.

japanese:
上杉さんは真面目な人だから、
真剣な想いにはちゃんと向き合ってくれるはずだよ！
translation:
Uesugi-san is a serious person,
and I'm sure he'll be attentive to your needs!

japanese:
そうね。
ちゃんと向き合ってくれるわ、絶対に。
translation:
That's right.
I'm sure he'll hear me out.

japanese: うん。
translation: Yes.

japanese:
だよね。
私もそう思う。
translation:
That's right.
I agree with you.

japanese:
（だから、すべては私次第なのよ。
　私がどれだけフー君を好きなのか、
　ちゃんと知ってもらえば、きっと……！）
translation:
(So it's all up to me.
 If Fu-kun learns how much I like him,
 I'm sure things will work out!)

japanese: 『彼を知り己を知れば百戦殆うからず』
translation:
'If you know your enemy and know yourself,
 in a hundred battles you will never be defeated.'

japanese: は？　なにそれ？
translation: Huh? What's that?

japanese:
孫子の兵法。
武将も使ってた戦術。
translation:
Sun Tzu's, The Art of War.
It's a tactic military commanders used.

japanese:
簡単に言うと、敵についても、味方についても、
ちゃんと知っておけば戦いに負けることは
ないって意味。
それはまあ、なんとなくわかるけど。
translation: Well, I kind of get that.

japanese:
二乃は自分の魅力をよく知ってると思う。
だからここは、敵のことをもっと考えてみたら
いいのかも。
translation:
I think you know your charms well, Nino,
so maybe you should think more about the enemy here.

japanese:
（敵って……この場合はフー君よね。
　私が落とそうとしてる相手なんだから）
translation:
(The enemy... She means Fu-kun, in this case.
 I am going to make him mine.)

japanese:
あんた、いいの？
私にアドバイスなんてして。
translation:
Is that really okay?
Sharing that kind of information.

japanese:
負けるつもりはない。
それに、最後に決めるのはフータローだから。
translation:
I don't intend to lose to you. Also, Futaro's the one 
who'll be choosing one of us in the end.

japanese:
だから敵に塩を送るってこと？
ずいぶんと余裕があるのね。
translation:
So, you're showing mercy, even to your enemy?
You have quite a lot of leeway.

japanese:
余裕なんてない。
私だって二乃がどれだけの女の子か知ってる。
translation:
I don't have any leeway at all.
I know how much of a catch you are, Nino.

japanese: だって、五つ子だもんね。
translation: As all of us are.

japanese:
……ええ、そうね。
ありがと三玖。
translation:
...Yeah, you're right.
Thanks, Miku.

japanese: 負けないから。
translation: I won't lose.

japanese:
こっちこそ。
手加減したら姉妹の縁を切るわよ？
translation:
I won't either.
If you go easy on me,
our relationship as sisters is over, you got it?

japanese: え、縁を切るだなんて、そんな！？
translation: Th-the relationship is over? That's drastic?!

japanese:
それくらい本気ってことよ。
フー君が誰を選んでも、
納得できるようにするためにもね。
translation:
That's how serious I am.
I wanna make sure that Fu-kun chooses the most 
convincing one of us.

japanese:
大丈夫だよ、五月ちゃん。
色々、考えすぎだって。
translation:
It's okay, Itsuki-chan!
You're thinking too much.

japanese:
私、考えたいことがあるから部屋に行くわね。
またあとで。
translation:
I have something to think about,
so I'm going to my room.
See you guys later.

japanese: うん。
translation: Yes.

japanese:
（三玖。私だって、あんたが
　どれだけ素敵な女の子なのかを知ってる。
　五つ子なんだから）
translation:
(Miku. I know what an amazing girl you are.
 Because we're quintuplets.)

japanese: （でも、絶対に負けないわ）
translation: (But, I will definitely not lose.)
